short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: displays a new tab page you can fully customize to your needs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fully customizable new tab page which shows you the time, weather and your favorite links. Everything can be customized in the settings, also the colors. This new tab page features a light and dark mode and the option to add multiple links. You can also easily export and import your settings as a csv file so all devices are fully synchronized.
